CustomField.description: "How likely are you to add another product to your Citron service or increase the frequency of the visits?' question from NPS survey where rating starts from 0 (not at all likely) to 10 (extremely likely).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "How likely are you to add another product to your Citron service or increase the frequency of the visits?' question from NPS survey where rating starts from 0 (not at all likely) to 10 (extremely likely).
CustomField.label: Likelihood to Add Product Increase Freq.
